Module main.software2
Package dao

Class CustomerQuery

java.lang.Object
DBConnection.DBConnection
dao.CustomerQuery
Direct Known Subclasses:
ViewCustomerListController
public class CustomerQuery extends DBConnection
This class contains performs CRUD(create, read, update, delete) queries on customer data from the customers table in the database

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customers> selectAllCustomers()
      This method selects all the data from the customers table in the database, creates customer objects, adds them to an ObservableList, and returns that list

      list of all customers

    • insertCustomer

      public static void insertCustomer(String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phone, long divisionId)
      This method creates a customer object in the customers table in the database with the data passed in
      Parameters:
      customerName - the customer name
      address - the customer address
      postalCode - the customer postal code
      phone - the customer phone number
      divisionId - the division ID

      phone - the customer phone number
